name: A double-bladed meat cleaver (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'spot weakness'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'cleave'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'axe fighting style'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'axe mastery'.
It gives great bonus to the skill 'hurl axes'.
The cleaver is unsurprisingly excellent at cleaving.
